Html:
Hello all 

Is there a way to show city limits (borders) on google or yahoo.

I know the info is avaiable so did someone already programed this feature?

Thanks

Ben

I know its available in canada and the US.

I dont know abour the other countries.

http://maps.google.ca/maps?q=sainte-adele,+qc&hl=fr&ie=UTF8&ll=45.952104,-74.134712&spn=0.187855,0.445976&sll=45.950821,-74.133339&sspn=0.023602,0.055747&vpsrc=0&gl=ca&hnear=Sainte-Ad%C3%A8le,+Les+Pays-d'en-Haut,+Qu%C3%A9bec&t=m&z=12
well google may have such data, but does it share it, thats the question
